abstract: Some firms hire consultants to help them lay off staff; five predictors of success in a career; Nasdaq offers help to firms looking for board members and more.
snippet: Some firms hire consultants to help them lay off staff; five predictors of success in a career; Nasdaq offers help to firms looking for board members and more.
lead_paragraph: ORACLE fired people via overnight mail.

headline.main: Letting a Stranger Do the Firing
headline.print_headline: Letting a Stranger Do the Firing
